subject: Re: [sugar] sanitycheck / libabiword-plugins patches
body:
Manuel Aguilar wrote:
> Hey Marco,
>
> There is a module that is built with gtk:
> ./lib/gtk-2.0/2.10.0/printbackends/libprintbackend-cups.so
>

Does the gtk build fail if you don't have it?
I don't have cups.h here but everything builds fine.

Or are you developing something which depends on gtk printing?

Marco
